long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This chrome extensions improves performance on Facebook Marketplace, and contains a suite of useful features.

Features include:
- Performance boost by blocking user tracking that gets called very frequently
- Seller account age check (to help warn users about interacting with fresh accounts)
- Distance check between your search location and the seller location

*PLEASE NOTE THIS PROJECT IS STILL IN ALPHA SO THERE MAY BE BUGS WHILST WE WORK ON DIFFERENT FEATURES*

If you find any issues with this extension please make sure you're on the latest version, then feel free to email me directly for support.
